MessageThread Class Reference

Documentation

This class handles a message thread. A message thread is a collection of messages that have been both sent and received

EON Storage form is:

{ type: mthread, id: group_id or sn, data: [ { type: MESSAGE_TEXT, sender: sn_t, #: callsign, data: data }, { type: MESSAGE_AUDIO, sender: sn_t, #: callsign, data: data }, { type: MESSAGE_TEXT, sender: sn_t, #: callsign, data: data }, { type: MESSAGE_AUDIO, sender: sn_t, #: callsign, data: data }, { type: MESSAGE_TEXT, sender: sn_t, #: callsign, data: data } ] } }

JSON Storage is:

{ "type": "mthread", "id": "group id or sn", "name": "group name or callsign", data: [ { "type": "text", "sender": "sn", "callsign": "callsign", "data": "text message" }, { "type": "audio", "sender": "sn", "callsign": "callsign", "data": "base64 encoded binary data" }, { "type": "text", "sender": "sn", "callsign": "callsign", "data": "text message" }, { "type": "audio", "sender": "sn", "callsign": "callsign", "data": "base64 encoded binary data" }, { "type": "text", "sender": "sn", "callsign": "callsign", "data": "text message" } ] } }

Definition at line 46 of file MessageThread.hpp.
